DataListSpec.Name: Website Sponsorship Checkout Source Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Used to populate the source drop down on the sponsorship checkout page
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_WEBSITESPONSORSHIPCHECKOUTSOURCE (@CONTEXTID nvarchar(100)) as begin -- CONTEXTID is not currently used.
set nocount on;
declare @sources table ( SORTORDER tinyint, APPEALID uniqueidentifier, SOURCEDESC nvarchar(50), HASADDITIONALINFORMATION bit, ADDITIONALINFORMATIONCAPTION nvarchar(100) )
insert @sources values (1, null, 'Appeal Code', 1, 'Enter the Appeal Code'), (3, null, 'Concert/Artist', 1, 'Enter the Concert/Artist'), (4, null, 'Facebook', 0, ''), (5, null, 'Friend', 0, ''), (6, null, 'Internet', 0, ''), (7, null, 'Ministry Representative', 1, 'Enter the Representative'), (8, null, 'Radio', 1, 'Enter the Radio Call Letters'), (9, null, 'Other ', 1, 'Enter How You Heard About MoM')
insert @sources select 2, ID, 'Children''s Cup', 0, '' from dbo.APPEAL where lower(NAME) = lower ('Ben Rodgers')
select SORTORDER, APPEALID, SOURCEDESC, HASADDITIONALINFORMATION, ADDITIONALINFORMATIONCAPTION from @sources order by SORTORDER end
